articles.title: Europe and US need each other, Nato chief Stoltenberg says - BBC.com
articles.description: Jens Stoltenberg says member states must come up with a plan to fund Ukraine for many years to come.

articles.title: UK's Cameron tells Europe: Pressure House Speaker Johnson on Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
